class.name: SwingAccessor
class.javadoc: The SwingAccessor utility class. The main purpose of this class is to enable accessing private and package-private fields of classes from different classes/packages. See sun.misc.SharedSecretes for another example.
We don't need any objects of this class. It's rather a collection of static methods and interfaces.

interface.name: JTextComponentAccessor
interface.javadoc: An accessor for the JTextComponent class. Note that we intentionally introduce the JTextComponentAccessor, and not the JComponentAccessor because the needed methods aren't override methods.
Calculates a custom drop location for the text component, representing where a drop at the given point should insert data.
Called to set or clear the drop location during a DnD operation.

class.javadoc: Set an accessor object for the javax.swing.text.JTextComponent class.
Retrieve the accessor object for the javax.swing.text.JTextComponent class.
